title: Bug 118780 - Set alias for columns in data set but expression builder shows old column names
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the column names displayed are not updated to reflect the aliases set for the columns.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.  
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.  
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.  
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.  
5. Observe that the column names displayed in the expression builder still show the old column names instead of the aliases set for the columns.
